lst.name: sentence
lst.str: When signs first emerged last Friday that OPEC was contemplating cutting the planned fourth quarter ceiling, spot prices of the most widely traded crude oil, Britain's Brent Blend, surged 30-40 cents a barrel.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In recent months Iraq has been producing 500,000 bpd above its assigned quota, and it could begin pumping a further 500,000 bpd when a new export pipeline comes on stream in September.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They forecast tight supplies later in the year, when demand for oil increases with the onset of the Northern Hemisphere winter, and further rises in spot prices.
